statements: SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 10000
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT symbol, volume FROM MarketData WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM MarketData
SELECT symbol, price, volume, timestamp FROM MarketData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE volume < 500 ORDER BY price ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY price DESC, volume ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM MarketData WHERE volume BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY symbol ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT symbol, timestamp FROM market_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, quantity FROM portfolio_positions WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price, timestamp FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT symbol, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING SUM(price) > 1000 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data UNION SELECT symbol, value FROM portfolio_positions;
SELECT symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, volume FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_positions WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY symbol DESC
SELECT symbol, volume FROM market_data WHERE volume < 1000 AND price < 50
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol LIKE 'AAPL%'
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM market_data WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY volume DESC
SELECT symbol, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM portfolio_positions GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_quantity > 1000
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT id, symbol, price FROM PortfolioPositions WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT id, symbol, exposure FROM RiskAssessment ORDER BY symbol DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Users WHERE roles @> '[{"role": "admin"}]';
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE price >= 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE price > 100
SELECT id, symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT symbol, quantity, value FROM PortfolioPositions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY value ASC
SELECT id, symbol, exposure FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_level = 'High'
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE roles @> '["admin"]'
SELECT * FROM MarketData;
SELECT symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PortfolioPositions ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score > 0.8;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE id = 100;
SELECT * FROM MarketData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT MAX(price), MIN(price) FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, SUM(quantity) FROM PortfolioPositions GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT Users.username, UserRoles.role FROM Users INNER JOIN UserRoles ON Users.id = UserRoles.user_id;
